title: Is it good to buy a used power supply for a PC? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: Is it good to buy a used power supply for a PC?A: I wouldn’t bother as the probability of the unit dying prematurely and no recourse for compensation. Only possibility of buying used electronic components is when new is not available and the seller guaranties the working condition.

Probably not. Unless you could know absolutely that it had never taken a voltage spike or power surge, you would probably be buying someone else's problem. Power supplies aren't all that expensive, and you entire system depends on the power supply providing the correct voltage. Best not to gamble with that.
